General.Name: Sinmah Capital Bhd
General.Description: Sinmah Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the contract farming, and marketing and distribution of poultry products in Malaysia. It operates through four segments: Poultry, Housing Development, Healthcare Services, and Other Business. The Poultry segment engages in the manufacture and wholesale of animal feed; poultry breeding; hatchery operations; poultry processing; and trading of day-old chicks, medications, and vaccines. The Housing Development segment develops and constructs residential and commercial properties. The Healthcare Services segment develops and runs hospitals, clinics, and laboratories, as well as provides related healthcare activities. The Others segment provides management services. It is also involved in the property management; general trading; and building and general contracting activities. The company was formerly known as Farm's Best Berhad and changed its name to Sinmah Capital Berhad in June 2017. Sinmah Capital Berhad was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Malacca, Malaysia.
